text: Love Me Tender is a 1956 American musical western movie directed by Robert D. Webb and starring Richard Egan, Debra Paget, Elvis Presley, Mildred Dunnock, James Drury, Russ Conway, Neville Brand, Robert Middleton, L. Q. Jones, Bruce Bennett. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:1956 musical movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:1950s American musical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Robert D. Webb
title: Love Me Tender (1956 movie)
